name: Rekhta
0:
”Alexa, open Rekhta”
”Tell me a Love shayari”
”Play shayari by Rahat Indori”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rekhta
des:
Rekhta.org is the world’s largest website for Urdu poetry and literature. 

Enjoy shers categorized according to poets and categories like Love, Sadness and Funny shayaris. With around a thousand Shayaris to choose from, it is the best way to enjoy poetry on Alexa. 

Please give it a try and we are open to including more Shayaris based on your valuable feedback.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
